Sentencas: This study is focused on the elaboration of 8 mol.% yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) thin films onto porous supporting NiO-8YSZ anode substrates using electrostatic spray deposition (ESD), and their microstructural and electrical characterizations.
Titulo: Elaboration and electrical characterization of electrosprayed YSZ thin films for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: ESD allows a good control of the stoichiometry and the morphology of the films.
Titulo: Elaboration and electrical characterization of electrosprayed YSZ thin films for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Dense films were obtained from both solutions and suspensions by varying substrate temperature, solution flow rate, concentration, proportions of solvents and deposition time.
Titulo: Elaboration and electrical characterization of electrosprayed YSZ thin films for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Structure and microstructure of the films, characterized by XRD and SEM, respectively, are discussed in the paper.
Titulo: Elaboration and electrical characterization of electrosprayed YSZ thin films for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the films obtained from suspension, determined using an original calibration method of a bulk platinum micro-electrode, were found identical to that of a bulk reference sample.
Titulo: Elaboration and electrical characterization of electrosprayed YSZ thin films for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)
